A '''Local Specialty''' is a [[material]] that is primarily found in a particular region in [[Teyvat]] and is indicated as such in its description e.g. "Local Specialty (Mondstadt)".

After a local specialty is harvested, it will [[Reset#Other Resets|respawn]] after 48 hours.

==Character Bonuses==
Certain characters have [[Talents]] that help spot local specialties by indicating them with a hand icon on the mini-map:
{{Talents by Category Table|Resource Talents&Local Specialty Talents}}

==Character Ascension==
Local Specialties are used in [[Character Ascensions|character ascension]]. The vast majority of characters use a Local Specialty from their official region.
